content: find fiori kits here 1 fiori is a simple and luxurious rectangular wrap featuring a beautiful textured lace motif running vertically along one edge and simple 2 x 2 rib at each end bluefaced leicester and mohair yarns combine to create a light and cozy accessory that can be worn as a full wrap or as an extra-lush scarf wear it out and about or snuggled up on the sofa once finished you won t want to be without it fiori also makes a perfect travel companion on planes and road trips ***designed by lisa di fruscia for sonder yarn co *** 1 https //sonderyarnco com/collections/kits/products/fiori-by-lisa-di-fruscia variant=42326509093109
